name: The Rider Waite Purple Neon Foil Tarot Deck: Premium & Complete Sets
description: Elevate your divination practice with The Rider Waite Purple Neon Foil Tarot Deck, a truly unique and mystical interpretation of the classic Rider Waite. This stunning deck features anti-scratch lamination and a mesmerizing purple neon foil design that adds a touch of magic to every reading. Crafted from premium 350 GSM cardboard, these 78 cards (22 Major Arcana, 56 Minor Arcana) are durable, easy to shuffle, and designed for both seasoned readers and beginners. Each card measures 2.75 x 4.72 inches (7 x 12 cm) and comes with a 36-page guidebook for immediate insight.
